reviews.content: One of the best upcoming role play servers out there amazing staff team the best owners/founders Zhalo + Icy bringing the best fiveM experience possible

reviews.content: one of the best server i played has good staff nice people over all great server

reviews.author: Zane
reviews.content: When I first joined the server, I did not know what to do. So I approached the lovely staff who helped me out so much it was unreal!!

reviews.content: Amazing people! Joined to just fined a place to call home and i found it just some lovely people and not money hungry

reviews.content: Good looking server so far can not wait to see what it looks like when it drops
